title: The Bots Are Back In Town
body:
Ladies and gentleman, after a long absence, the bots are back in ARAM.
So out of curiosity, are these bots created by Riot to fill the player queue? Or is it some Blizzard conspiracy to help make the game more toxic?

replies.body: Can we have an option to report bots so that their accounts get flagged and they get banned other than the cheating / third party so that we can get rid of the problem?
It's grinding to 30 is a pain in the ass, so behold all the bots that sell accounts.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=kq7GxUuy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-23T22:15:34.852+0000)
>
> It's grinding to 30 is a pain in the ass, so behold all the bots that sell accounts.

yep I reckon the new system, along with a shrinking game population really incentivises bots.

Makes you wonder why they are so eager to hand out bans.
